name: Affected
label: Affected
definition: Skin region is determined to be affected by a skin disease.

name: Normal
label: Normal
definition: The area within a sample that is represented by non-tumor tissue.

name: Organoid
label: Organoid
definition: A three dimensional mass comprised of a cultured cell or tissue sample that resembles an in vivo tissue or organ. Organoids are grown in vitro from a combination of cells or tissue fragments cultured in medium containing a variety of biochemical factors.

name: Tumor
label: Tumor
definition: A tumor sample, or entire tumor that is removed for microscopic examination.

name: Tumoroid
label: Tumoroid
definition: A three dimensional mass comprised of a cultured tumor cell or tumor sample that resembles an in vivo tumor. Tumoroid are grown in vitro from a combination of cells or tissue fragments cultured in medium containing a variety of biochemical factors.
